answerText: Moll Flanders[10] Defoe also wrote this novel, also about a woman, who runs through all of society by courting a prince and prostituting herself out, all the while being served by the loyal Amy.
heading: Terrapin |2013 | Chris Ray - FINAL | 20 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Answer the following about English novelist Daniel Defoe. For 10 points each: [10] Defoe wrote a picturesque novel about this woman, who was born from a woman imprisoned in Newgate, before being shipped to the Americas. She marries many times, including her half-brother, but ultimately returns happy to England at the age of 70.
